name: Sajiyah Salat
bio: In Search of DevOps Internships | Hacktoberfest 2022 Winner | Technical Writer at Hashnode | Open Source Project Maintainer and Active Contributor to Kubernetes.

milestones.title: Won Hacktoberfest 2022
milestones.description: Made Github profile on June 2022 | Started Contributing in Multiple Projects.

milestones.title: Started Documenting my journey on twitter and linkedin
milestones.description: I post daily about my learnings on twitter and linkedin. Many poeple support my work and I have made great connections.

milestones.title: Started Writing Blogs
milestones.description: My blog are my stories of how I achieved a certain height. Many poeple got inspired by my journey.

milestones.title: Made Three DevOps Project
milestones.description: After Completing my DevOps Basics. I started making Projects. My projects mainly contain the knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Golang. My Projects are live on Github.

milestones.title: Completed cka course from kodekloud
milestones.description: DevOps is my passion and I have completd all the basics about it. I have a good hold in kuberenetes and soon I will give cka(certified kubernetes administrator) exam. I have written a blogs on this topic.

milestones.title: Started my youtube video
milestones.description: This youtube channel will be based on github contributions and community work. If you are just starting out in open source, I have many things to serve you.
